articles.description: Health news highlight a resurgence in mask mandates at hospitals, the importance of nutrition in maintaining health, the link between screen time and sensory differences in children, and the benefits of annual breast cancer screenings.
articles.content: In recent health news, a resurgence in mask mandates at hospitals in New York and other states is making headlines due to continuing health concerns. Medical professionals are expressing their though… [+2408 chars]
